content.p: This is my personal homepage at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam where I'm a student Computer Science. My main interests there are theoretical computer science and software technology.
As of september 2005, I'm following the master's program Formal Methods and Software Verification.
From September to December 2006, I'm practicum assistent for the course Inleiding Logica (Introduction to Logic). Some notes are available for students taking this course.
First things first. My girlfriend is named Loes. She knows a thing or two about neuroscience and likes chocolate and Peking Express.
My friends Alizarin are one of the best uilenbands. They play uilenmusic. I also like Sonic Youth and some other bands, but they are not friends of mine.
I believe in the power of free and open information and software. This includes in particular research and educational material. For some online pointers, try my Links page.
Here are some important, funny, worrying, or otherwise interesting links I stumbled upon recently. They are taken from my del.icio.us bookmarks.
